Pet Insurance
Done Right

Simple policies, transparent claims, and free of charge 24/7 online vet support

Instant Quote

Our Advantages

Free Vet Support

Cooper policyholders have access to free of charge video calls with a certified vet 24/7

Simple Policies

We believe that pet insurance shouldn’t be complicated. That’s why our policies are simple and easy to understand. No hidden fees or complicated clauses

Transparent Claims

Transparent and trackable claims process. File claims online with the tap of a button. You can track your claims in our easy to use the app

Dogs

Keep your dog or puppy covered when it needs treatment for a new accident or illness

Learn More

Cats

Keep your cat or kitten covered when it needs treatment for a new accident or illness

Learn More

Pet insurance is designed to help cover vet bills if your pet gets injured, ill or in case of an emergency

Cooper Gets Your Pup Covered

Accident

Any unforeseen situation in which your pet gets hurt

Illness

Infections, dysfunctions of internal organs, and other sudden illnesses

Trauma

Injuries, cuts, or wounds. Surgery and rehabilitation coverage

Other

Your furry friend acting strange? Get a 24/7 online vet consultation free of charge
